Directions
To make the Cardamom-Infused Bourbon:
Place 1⁄4 cup cardamom pods in a resealable jar. Crush with a wooden spoon to crack about half the pods (this can also be done in a mortar and pestle.) Top with 1 cup bourbon, shake, infuse for 1 1/2 hours at room temperature. Strain through a fine mesh strainer, discard solids, and re-bottle bourbon.
To make the cocktail:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add apple brandy, cardamom-infused bourbon, lemon juice, and honey syrup. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds.
Strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with soda and garnish with lemon twist.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer, resealable jar, fine-mesh strainer
